DOC.brief_title: PROPRANOLOL PLUS LIGATION REDUCES RECURRENCE OF ESOPHAGEAL VARICES ?
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND AND AIMS Bleeding esophagogastric varix ( EV ) major complication portal hypertension . Beta-blockers well-established cornerstone portal hypertension treatment . Band ligation best endoscopic treatment prevent EV bleeding . The exact benefit beta-blocker association band ligation remain defined , especially primary prophylaxis . This prospective randomized control trial compare EBL propranolol EBL alone primary prophylaxis variceal bleeding among cirrhotic patient high-risk varix . PATIENTS AND METHODS : The patient high-risk varix randomly allocate EBL plus propranolol ( Group I ) EBL alone ( Group II ) . EBL perform 3-week interval till obliteration varix . In Group I , incremental dosage propranolol ( sufficient reduce heart rate 55 beats/min 25 % reduction baseline ) administer continued obliteration varix end study . The follow-up patient 2 year . The primary outcome study EV recurrence two year follow-up . The secondary outcome EV eradication , bleed eradication , mortality complication follow-up .
